translations: v．妨碍，阻碍：阻止或使某事物的进展变得困难。
· The heavy rain impedes the progress of the construction project.
大雨阻碍了建筑工程的进展。

phrs.translation: 严重妨碍有效竞争标准
贫困能够妨碍认知功能

sentences.sentence: Poverty impedes access to existing interventions.
sentences.translation: 贫穷阻碍获取现有干预措施。

sentences.sentence: Make sure your Windows are clear of anything that impedes the light.
sentences.translation: 确保你的窗户干净，没有任何挡住光线的东西。

sentences.sentence: Poverty also impedes the development of new products for diseases of the poor.
sentences.translation: 贫穷还会阻碍研制用于穷人病的新产品。
